info.name: WildWareness API
info.description: > Endpoints for testing our own backend API developed for WildWareness

exec: // Test to check if response received
// Check id property and sortable attributes
pm.test("Each fire has id and sortable attributes", function () {
pm.test("All fire ids are unique", function () {

query.description: current page in pagination
number of instances on model page

input text for search bar on wildfires 
model page
select attribute to sort by (options for name or county)
select how to sort by (options for ascending = asc, desc = descending)
location of fire to filter by (counties to select from)
year of fire to filter by (input is text)
filter by acres burned (i.e. >500)
inactive vs active status of fire to filter by
